product_name: Riderz Cable Combo You Set It Lock - Boys'
long_description: A kids' bike lock at a great value, the Riderz Cable Combo You Set It Lock for boys offers a tough steel cable covered in smooth vinyl. The Riderz Cable Combo You Set It Lock for boys uses a 4-digit resettable combination lock so no one has to worry about lost keys.
short_description: A kids' bike lock at a great value, the Riderz Cable Combo You Set It Lock for boys offers a tough steel cable covered in smooth vinyl.
